shortdesc.ph: Set the blocklist of subscriptions for audio streams.

p.codeblock: virtual int setSubscribeAudioBlacklist(uid_t* uidList, int uidNumber) = 0;

section.p: You can call this method to specify the audio streams of a user that you do not want to subscribe to.

ul.li: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.
The blacklist is not affected by the setting in , and autoSubscribeAudio in .
Once the blocklist of subscriptions is set, it is effective even if you leave the current channel and rejoin the channel.
If a user is added in the safelist and blocklist at the same time, only the blocklist takes effect.

pd.p: The user ID list of users that you do not want to subscribe to.

If you want to specify the audio streams of a user that you do not want to subscribe to, add the ID of that user in this list. If you want to remove a user from the blocklist, you need to call the method to update the user ID list; this means you only add the uid of users that you do not want to subscribe to in the new user ID list.

plentry.pd: The number of users in the user ID list.
